issue.title: [R][CI] Fix Rtools 4.0 build: pacman sync
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9151](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9151). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Apparently the package index was out of sync and nothing was syncing it. The Rtools 3.5 build does sync because it sets a different package index.
